name: Hop Single Sided
description: Supplies {{token}} to a liquidity pool on [Hop Exchange](https://app.hop.exchange/#/pools) and stakes it to earn HOP and trading fees. Rewards are harvested, sold for more {{token}}, and deposited back into the strategy.
